articles.title: South African man, 26, killed in Jerusalem by Hamas gunman - News24
articles.description: A South African man was killed during an attack by the Palestinian Islamist movement, Hamas, in Jerusalem's Old City.
articles.content:
• A South African was killed during an attack by a Hamas gunman in Jerusalem.
  • Eliyahu Kay, 26, was a tour guide in Jerusalem.
